content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, Philo Vance starts us off with The Rooftop Murder Case, his story from May 2, 1950.

(26:30) Our second story is Two Deaths For A Hero, the May 25, 1954, episode of Mr. And Mrs. North.

Download CaseClosed759

If you enjoy this program every week and would like to help support it, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you to all who’ve helped out over the last 14 years!
